title: Amazing views of the Almore mountains
review: Bright end corner is curve on the road while your way to Almora. It has some great views of the Almora mountains from there.

title: Good view of Hills from the top.
review: It was a fine experience with my family(teens), the weather was little cloudy on the day I visited.

title: Mesmerizing view of mountains!
review: I was on my way to Jageshwar in the morning and happened to cross this place and what a delight it was, an excellent spot to be there for great photographs and breath of fresh air.

title: NOT a must visit place
review: Though you can find this spot famous on internet and travelling sites, but it is not a must visit tourist spot.  View of sun you can see from here is not much different what you can see from the hotels roof or from some another point.

title: Average
review: For me it was an average experience. yes the beautiful views of himalayan mountains from this place. but not unique experience here. anyone can find more beautiful sights from another locations.

title: Bright end corner...must see..!!!
review: A great place to visit with absolutely stunning and panoramic views of the valley and the sunset

title: Bright End corner givea you bright smile
review: During sunset we were there to checkout the view as heard about this corner from the locals.

title: sunset point
review: Named Bright End Corner..... coz you can have a beautiful view of sunset from this pont .... Mirza ji ki Cofee and burger is an additional advantage here....

title: Old Gold kinda!
review: The potential this place has is great.i guess they don't have enough resources. The quality of what was served was great. The old man who looks after the kitchen works with passion.

title: best place to see sunrise and sunset
review: Bright End Corner is the best place to watch sunrise and sunset. It is situated at the end of the Almora ridge from where one can enjoy panoramic sights of the magnificent Himalayas.Swami Vivekananda has spent some time here. Its natural beauty and tranquility is considered one of the best spots for meditation.

title: Best place in Almora
review: This is my favorite place in Almora. Where I want to go everyday. In this month 29 I m with my family in this beautiful. Place and see sunset. I love that place.

title: Most Beautiful sunset from Bright End Corner. A nature lover will love it.
review: One of the most beautiful wonder the nature has created for us is the phenomena of sunrise and the setting sun. In the hills the beauty of sunset and sunrise is beyond description. Having lived in the hills for years I have loved sunsets and rising sun.

title: Wonderful
review: U have to visited if u want to see sun beautiness. I visited there every year.

title: Absolutely Bright !!!
review: We went there on 30.06.2015 , we where travelling from Almora to Jageshwar , it was a wonderful experience throughout the journey , This bright end corner is really very bright , we took some breathtaking photos and videos.

title: What a view
review: A great breathtaking view of the whole valley. Even the river Kosi is visible from this point glistening under the bright sun.

title: Nice sunset point
review: Located West end of Almora side, this place is besides Ramkrishna Math. Famous for sunset, it is good to see splendid himalayas West of Almora. You can also see Bagh Bakri from here.

title: In communication with mother nature
review: By viewing this you can get a gimp of what high altitude can be, what nature can give you if you have to preserve it. Its a speechless experience standing in front of the view.

title: super veiw of Himalaya`s...Sun Set & Sun rise....******
review: There is great time to spend at this corner..... near by many restaurant are available for take a cup of coffee & swip.....with..this for a moment of its Greatness****.

title: Place to view distant dreams - Himalayas and even the sun
review: This place in Almora attracts the brightness to the most from the sun during sunrise/sunset and is rightly named as Bright-end. We have visited this during the morning. We were waiting to see the sun rise well in advance and we could see the clouds settled around the nearby hills offering a pleasing view. As time grows by the colours of the various objects around the area keeps changing and the views getting better and better. The first splash of the sun started falling on a highest mountain viewed from a very far distance and then the rays started spreading into the other hills and to the full of the valley itself. There were few people doing meditation over there. The taxi driver told that the Himalayan mountain range visible from there is Nilkantha mountain range and I am not sure about this since I have never been to Nilkantha mountain range so far. There is a café located near this area and you can enjoy having slight refreshment here over the sun which has initiated the refreshment anyway. This place is nearby AIR building and there of lot of hindrances like electrical cables and nearby buildings to have a full panoramic view. I feel tourism dept. should construct a view point in this area to ensure the panoramic breath-taking view of the bright end.

title: Very good scenic views of the valley
review: Bright End Corner is the patch of the road just before you enter Almora from Nainital side. The views of the valley are fantastic from this place and specially sunrise is worth seeing. There is also Ramkrishna Mission temple at this place which you can visit.

title: The view can take your breathe away
review: Located at a hair pin turn, the view from this spot is out of the world. A must see if you happen to pass by this road!

title: Superb Superb Sunset view
review: Bright End Corner is around 3 Kms from main Almora & you can go here by walk on evening. You can take tea & snacks here & enjoy a great look

title: The Sunset Point
review: Bright End Corner is a place where one can have an excellent view of the sunrise & sunset. Bright End Corner is very famous destination among the travelers. It is a very peacefully located place. One must visit this place whenever coming to Almora...

title: Sunrise & Sunset Points
review: Bright End Corner is a place in Almora, famous for sunrise and sunset points. It is a place where one can listen to his soul in serenity and tranquility of the surrounding environs. It is situated 2 KMS from Almora..This site is famous for picturesque sunset & sunrise seen through the Himalyan peaks.. An excellent place to relaxe..

title: Best Sunset view I have ever seen
review: Even though i belong from Almora, but I hardly miss any chance to have coffee by enjoying a perfect view of sunset  in Bright End Corner, Almora. A little walk from bright end corner will lead you to Dolidana temple, the best place to feel the cool breeze. I must say, don’t miss any chance to be here when you are in almora.

title: Bright End Corner
review: Bright End Corner is a place in Almora well known to sea sun rise and sunset view. It is a place where one can listen to his soul in serenity and tranquility of the surrounding environs. It is situated 2 KMS from Almora..This site is famous for picturesque sunset & sunrise seen through the Himalyan peaks.. An excellent place to...

title: Really a bright place for viewing the Sun set
review: Nice place near the city to watch the sun set. The place where we stand and the hill we view is quite a distance with uninterpreted view and hence you can Better place could be the Ramakrishna Mutt, where you may have to get down the hill. Fro sun rise I think Kasar Devi is the best place.

title: Mighty Himalayan Peaks - So Near and Yet So Far .
review: Bright end corner 2 km from Almora on the road to Sualbari and at the end of the Almora ridge ,  was famous for its out of the world sunset and a panoramic , thrilling , closer view of Himalayan peaks , such as Nanda Ghunti ( 6309 m ) , Trishul I ( 7120 m ) , Trishul II ( 6690 m ) ,  Trishul III (6008 m ) ,  Mrigthuni ( 6855 m ) , Maiktoli ( 6803 m ) , Nanda Devi (7824 m )  , Nanda Devi East ( 7434 m ) , Chhanguch (6322 m )  , Nandakot ( 6861 m ) , Nandakhat ( 6611 m ) , Panwali Dwar (6663 m ) , Panchachuli I ( 6354 m ) , Panchachuli II ( 6903 m ) , Panchachuli III ( 6312 m ) ,   Panchachuli  IV (6334 m ) and Panchachuli V ( 6437 m ) .

title: Bright End Corner with bright beautiful end to the day
review: Bright End Corner in Almora does have a view to great sunsets, the rays dipping over the hills on the left and hiding behind the view of Himalayan Ranges visible on the right, especially the tri-peaks of Trishul and Nanda Devi.
